newsitem.title: GERMANY: Volksfuersorge chief tipped for top AMB post - paper.
newsitem.headline: Volksfuersorge chief tipped for top AMB post - paper.

text.p: The front-runner to become the next chairman of German insurance group AMB Holding is the current head of AMB's Volksfuersorge unit Hans Jaeger, Germany's Welt am Sonntag newspaper said on Sunday.
Jaeger, 56, is likely to be picked to succeed current management board chairman Wolfgang Kaske at a meeting of AMB's supervisory board on August 29, the newspaper said, without naming sources.
Kaske's term ends at the end of 1997.
Aachener und Muenchener Beteiligungs AG, known as AMB, declined comment on the report. A spokeswoman said only that the choice of Kaske's successor was a matter for the supervisory board.
